rules_text:
When this creature enters, put a zeal counter on target Faerie.
{2}{R}, Remove a zeal counter from this creature: Create a tapped 1/1 red Cat creature token with prowess. [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, the token gets +1/+1 until end of turn)[/i]
notes: Faerie wrights born after the arrival of humans were more willing to use ichorous materials in their designs.
